医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
瑞典出血热病毒向南部蔓延与银行田鼠有关研究人员发现，瑞典南部斯科讷的银行田鼠携带一种可引起人类出血热的病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Southern-expansion-of-hemorrhagic-fever-virus-in-Sweden-linked-to-bank-voles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Southern-expansion-of-hemorrhagic-fever-virus-in-Sweden-linked-to-bank-voles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=714fa8ac-28f4-4843-b7de-b446b742709d Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Southern expansion of hemorrhagic fever virus in Sweden linked to bank voles
结核病的新分类旨在提高对疾病早期阶段的关注伦敦大学学院研究人员组成的国际团队提出了一种结核病 (TB) 分类新方法，旨在提高对疾病早期阶段的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-classification-of-tuberculosis-aims-to-improve-focus-on-the-early-stages-of-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-classification-of-tuberculosis-aims-to-improve-focus-on-the-early-stages-of-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d688ce03-7d81-4a21-9c01-80f54017a8b0 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:34:57 -0400 New classification of tuberculosis aims to improve focus on the early stages of disease
增强产生丁酸的肠道细菌可降低感染住院率一项针对两个大型欧洲患者队列的研究发现，在两个大型国家队列中，患者肠道中产生丁酸的细菌每增加 10%，因任何感染而住院的风险就会下降 14% 至 25%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Boosting-butyrate-having-gut-bacteria-lowers-hospitalization-rates-for-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Boosting-butyrate-having-gut-bacteria-lowers-hospitalization-rates-for-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cca63e82-692a-49a8-a536-53bd874b70b4 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:30:08 -0400 Boosting butyrate-producing gut bacteria lowers hospitalization rates for infections
研究评估了替泽帕肽在患有 1 型糖尿病的超重/肥胖成人中的使用同行评审期刊《糖尿病技术与治疗》(DTT) 上的一项新研究评估了替西帕肽在患有 1 型糖尿病的超重/肥胖成人中的使用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-evaluates-the-use-of-tirzepatide-in-overweightobese-adults-with-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Study-evaluates-the-use-of-tirzepatide-in-overweightobese-adults-with-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=379e9cc0-ccdd-4401-b3ca-fee90dd8af61 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:27:04 -0400 Study evaluates the use of tirzepatide in overweight/obese adults with type 1 diabetes
通过类胚模型解开早期人类发育之谜这是生命中最具决定性的时刻之一——胚胎发育中的关键一步，此时一个模糊的细胞球重新排列成有序的三层结构，为所有的未来奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Unlocking-the-mysteries-of-early- human-development-through-blastoid-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Unlocking-the-mysteries-of-early- human-development-through-blastoid-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74929597-7a38-4485-a92b-8b1fb0afc40f Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:20:25 -0400 Unlocking the mysteries of early human development through blastoid models
阿尔茨海默氏症夫妇的相互关怀可增强双方的福祉在患有阿尔茨海默氏病的情况下，配偶通常承担照顾者的角色。加州大学戴维斯分校领导的研究表明，患者也可以支持他们的看护者，而且互惠互利的护理是互惠互利的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Reciprocated-care-in-Alzheimers- Couples-enhances-mutual-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Reciprocated-care-in-Alzheimers- Couples-enhances-mutual-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56da443c-8b0a-42de-b73b-1662b064109b Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:14:30 -0400 Reciprocated care in Alzheimer's couples enhances mutual well-being
评估教师对残疾和非残疾学生的有效性研究通常集中在教师和教育工作者如何最好地指导和适应残疾学生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Evaluating-teacher-efficiency-for-students-with-and-without-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Evaluating-teacher-efficiency-for-students-with-and-without-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=329c6573-b347-451d-98ae-4cd6828f92ef Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:11:03 -0400 Evaluating teacher effectiveness for students with and without disabilities
研究人员揭示了控制小鼠卵巢发育的蛋白质弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员揭示了控制小鼠出生前后卵巢发育的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Researchers-shed-light-on- Proteins-controlling-the-development-of-ovaries-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Researchers-shed-light-on- Proteins-controlling-the-development-of-ovaries-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cdd3913-8fe2-4514-ba1d-d0d43a9f9d31 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:06:35 -0400 Researchers shed light on proteins controlling the development of ovaries in mice
社区贫困、食物获取和出生结果之间存在联系根据美国国立卫生研究院环境对儿童健康结果（ECHO）计划的一项新研究，居住在居民收入较低且怀孕期间食物获取有限的社区会增加出生小于胎龄或出生体重较低婴儿的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Link-found- Between-neighborhood-poverty-food-access-and-birth-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Link-found- Between-neighborhood-poverty-food-access-and-birth-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4213eec-cc72-475b-86c5-04f17e15365c Fri, 22 Mar 2024 23:02:03 -0400 Link found between neighborhood poverty, food access, and birth outcomes
确定阻止癫痫进展的新治疗方法根据佩雷尔曼研究所的最新研究，只有极小比例的神经元在小鼠癫痫发作后表现出变化，但这些变化可能是永久性的，并引发未来的癫痫发作，从而影响整个大脑并导致认知受损，例如记忆和学习。宾夕法尼亚大学医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Novel-treatment-approach-to-halt-epilepsy-progression-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Novel-treatment-approach-to-halt-epilepsy-progression-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3030b355-8744-4386-8fb9-f4fda48ec324 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 22:56:56 -0400 Novel treatment approach to halt epilepsy progression identified
